doc.previous: During his stay in Hispania he became familiar with the agriculture and especially the gold mines of the north and west of the country 35 His descriptions of the various methods of mining appear to be eye witness judging by the discussion of gold mining methods in his Natural History He might have visited the mine excavated at Las Medulas
doc.after: The last position of procurator an uncertain one was of Gallia Belgica based on Pliny s familiarity with it The capital of the province was Augusta Treverorum Trier named for the Treveri surrounding it Pliny says that in the year but one before this a severe winter killed the first crops planted by the Treviri they sowed again in March and had a most abundant harvest 36 The problem is to identify this the year in which the passage was written Using 77 as the date of composition Syme 37 arrives at AD 74 75 as the date of the procuratorship when Pliny is presumed to have witnessed these events The argument is based entirely on presumptions nevertheless this date is required to achieve Suetonius continuity of procuratorships if there was one in Gallia Belgica
